name: CLActivityType
desc: Constants indicating the type of activity associated with location updates.

items.name: case other
items.desc: The location manager is being used for an unknown activity.

items.name: case automotiveNavigation
items.desc: The location manager is being used specifically during vehicular navigation to track location changes to the automobile.

items.name: case fitness
items.desc: The location manager is being used to track fitness activities such as walking, running, cycling, and so on.

items.name: case otherNavigation
items.desc: The location manager is being used to track movements for other types of vehicular navigation that are not automobile related.

items.name: case airborne
items.desc: The location manager is being used specifically during airborne activities.
